1. **The Last Song of Manuel Sendero** (2018) - A film adaptation of the novel of the same name by José Saramago, which tells the story of a blind musician who travels through Spain with his young daughter.
2. **The Professor and the Madman** (2019) - A film adaptation of the book of the same name by Simon Winchester, which tells the story of the creation of the Oxford English Dictionary.
3. **The Goldfinch** (2019) - A film adaptation of the novel of the same name by Donna Tartt, which tells the story of a young man who becomes obsessed with a painting after his mother is killed in a terrorist attack.
4. **The Nightingale** (2018) - A film adaptation of the novel of the same name by Kristin Hannah, which tells the story of two sisters who are separated during the French Revolution.
5. **The Hate U Give** (2018) - A film adaptation of the young adult novel of the same name by Angie Thomas, which tells the story of a 16-year-old girl who witnesses the fatal shooting of her unarmed friend by a police officer.
6. **The Woman in the Window** (2021) - A film adaptation of the novel of the same name by A.J. Finn, which tells the story of an agoraphobic woman who witnesses a crime from her window.
7. **The Power of the Dog** (2021) - A film adaptation of the novel of the same name by Thomas Savage, which tells the story of a wealthy rancher who becomes obsessed with his new brother-in-law.
8. **Dune** (2021) - A film adaptation of the novel of the same name by Frank Herbert, which tells the story of a young man who must travel to a dangerous planet to fulfill his destiny.
9. **The Eyes of Tammy Faye** (2021) - A film adaptation of the documentary of the same name, which tells the story of Tammy Faye Bakker, a televangelist who was known for her flamboyant style and her support of LGBTQ rights.
10. **Belfast** (2021) - A film adaptation of the novel of the same name by Kenneth Branagh, which tells the story of a young boy growing up in Belfast during the Troubles.
